statements: SELECT * FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, click_through_rate FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT AVG(click_through_rate) FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT SUM(conversions) FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversions > 10;
SELECT campaign_id, roi FROM campaign_performance WHERE roi < 1.0;
SELECT campaign_id, click_through_rate, conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE roi > 0.5;
SELECT AVG(roi) FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, MAX(conversions) FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY roi DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY conversions ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance OFFSET 10;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversions > 5 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversions > 5 AND roi > 1.0;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(conversions), AVG(roi) FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING SUM(conversions) > 20;
SELECT campaign_id, click_through_rate FROM campaign_performance WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversions >= 100;
SELECT AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_ctr, MAX(conversions) AS max_conversions FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, conversions, roi FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversions > 50 AND roi > 2.0;
SELECT campaign_id, click_through_rate, roi FROM campaign_performance WHERE click_through_rate BETWEEN 0.4 AND 0.6;
SELECT campaign_id, conversions FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_campaigns FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, click_through_rate, conversions, roi FROM campaign_performance WHERE roi IS NOT NULL;
SELECT campaign_id, click_through_rate, conversions, roi FROM campaign_performance WHERE campaign_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT DISTINCT conversions FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, ROUND(roi, 2) AS rounded_roi FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, click_through_rate FROM campaign_performance WHERE click_through_rate < AVG(click_through_rate);
SELECT campaign_id, conversions, click_through_rate FROM campaign_performance WHERE click_through_rate > 0.3 OR conversions < 50;
SELECT AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_ctr FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, click_through_rate * conversions AS ctr_times_conversions FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, click_through_rate, conversions, roi FROM campaign_performance WHERE click_through_rate * conversions > 50;
SELECT campaign_id, click_through_rate, conversions, ROI FROM campaign_performance WHERE campaign_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT campaign_id, click_through_rate, conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE click_through_rate > 0.6 AND conversions < 100;
SELECT AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_ctr FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversions > 50;
SELECT campaign_id, click_through_rate, ROI FROM campaign_performance WHERE click_through_rate + roi > 1.0;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ad_performance;
SELECT performance_id, click_through_rate, conversions FROM ad_performance;
SELECT * FROM ad_performance WHERE campaign_id = 10;
SELECT click_through_rate, ROI FROM ad_performance WHERE conversions > 50;
SELECT * FROM ad_performance WHERE performance_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM ad_performance WHERE campaign_id = 15 AND click_through_rate > 2.5;
SELECT campaign_id, ROI FROM ad_performance WHERE ROI < 0;
SELECT campaign_id, click_through_rate, conversions FROM ad_performance WHERE click_through_rate BETWEEN 2.0 AND 3.0;
SELECT ad_campaigns.campaign_name, ad_performance.click_through_rate FROM ad_campaigns JOIN ad_performance ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id;
SELECT ad_campaigns.campaign_name, ad_performance.conversions FROM ad_campaigns LEFT JOIN ad_performance ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id;
SELECT ad_campaigns.campaign_name, ad_performance.ROI FROM ad_campaigns RIGHT JOIN ad_performance ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id;
SELECT ad_campaigns.campaign_name, ad_performance.click_through_rate FROM ad_campaigns INNER JOIN ad_performance ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id;
SELECT ad_performance.performance_id, ad_campaigns.start_date, ad_campaigns.end_date FROM ad_campaigns LEFT JOIN ad_performance ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id;
SELECT ad_performance.performance_id, ad_campaigns.budget FROM ad_campaigns RIGHT JOIN ad_performance ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, click_through_rate, ROI FROM ad_campaigns JOIN ad_performance ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date, click_through_rate FROM ad_campaigns JOIN ad_performance ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id WHERE click_through_rate > 3.5;
SELECT campaign_name, conversions FROM ad_performance WHERE conversions >= 100;
SELECT campaign_name, click_through_rate FROM ad_performance WHERE ROI > 5.0;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_ctr FROM ad_performance GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_campaigns FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM ad_performance GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT campaign_name, AVG(ROI) AS avg_roi FROM ad_performance WHERE ROI IS NOT NULL GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING AVG(ROI) > 3.0;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget * 0.1 AS expected_profit FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) AS campaign_duration_days FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget / conversions AS cost_per_conversion FROM ad_performance WHERE conversions > 0;
SELECT campaign_name, ROUND(budget * 0.2, 2) AS twenty_percent_budget FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, click_through_rate, ROI FROM ad_performance WHERE click_through_rate > 1.0 AND ROI > 2.5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget, click_through_rate FROM ad_campaigns JOIN ad_performance ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id;

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_ctr, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions, AVG(ROI) AS avg_roi FROM ad_campaigns JOIN ad_performance ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_id, campaign_name;
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates
SELECT campaign_id, clicks FROM click_through_rates
SELECT campaign_id, impressions FROM click_through_rates
SELECT * FROM conversions
SELECT campaign_id, conversions FROM conversions
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_rate FROM conversions
SELECT * FROM roi
SELECT campaign_id, revenue FROM roi
SELECT campaign_id, cost FROM roi
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, impressions FROM click_through_rates
SELECT campaign_id, conversions, conversion_rate FROM conversions
SELECT campaign_id, revenue, cost FROM roi
SELECT sum(clicks) as total_clicks FROM click_through_rates
SELECT sum(impressions) as total_impressions FROM click_through_rates
SELECT sum(conversions) as total_conversions FROM conversions
SELECT avg(conversion_rate) as avg_conversion_rate FROM conversions
SELECT sum(revenue) as total_revenue FROM roi
SELECT sum(cost) as total_cost FROM roi
SELECT campaign_id, sum(clicks) as total_clicks FROM click_through_rates GROUP BY campaign_id
SELECT campaign_id, sum(conversions) as total_conversions FROM conversions GROUP BY campaign_id
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates WHERE clicks > 100 AND impressions > 100
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, impressions FROM click_through_rates WHERE clicks >= 50 OR impressions >= 1000
SELECT AVG(clicks), SUM(impressions) FROM click_through_rates
SELECT conversions.campaign_id, conversions.conversions, roi.revenue FROM conversions JOIN roi ON conversions.campaign_id = roi.campaign_id
SELECT SUM(revenue), AVG(cost) FROM roi
SELECT campaign_id, conversions, conversion_rate FROM conversions WHERE conversions > 10 AND conversion_rate > 0.5
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, revenue FROM click_through_rates JOIN roi ON click_through_rates.campaign_id = roi.campaign_id
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates WHERE impressions < 500 AND campaign_id IN (SELECT campaign_id FROM conversions WHERE conversions > 5)
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, impressions, conversions FROM click_through_rates JOIN conversions ON click_through_rates.campaign_id = conversions.campaign_id
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, impressions, revenue FROM click_through_rates JOIN roi ON click_through_rates.campaign_id = roi.campaign_id
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks;
SELECT viewer_id, device_type FROM ad_clicks WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT click_id, campaign_id, click_timestamp FROM ad_clicks WHERE viewer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM conversions;
SELECT customer_id, conversion_value FROM conversions WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM roi;
SELECT revenue, cost FROM roi WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget >= 5000.00;
SELECT viewer_id, device_type FROM ad_clicks WHERE campaign_id = 2 ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT conversion_id, campaign_id, conversion_timestamp FROM conversions WHERE customer_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks WHERE click_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(conversion_value) AS avg_conversion_value FROM conversions GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(*) AS click_count FROM ad_clicks GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(conversion_value) AS total_conversion_value FROM conversions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM roi GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, revenue - cost AS profit_loss FROM roi;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks JOIN ad_campaigns ON ad_clicks.campaign_id = ad_campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT click_timestamp, device_type, campaign_name FROM ad_clicks JOIN ad_campaigns ON ad_clicks.campaign_id = ad_campaigns.campaign_id WHERE device_type = 'mobile';
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(conversion_value) AS avg_conversion_value FROM conversions GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT conversion_timestamp, conversion_value FROM conversions WHERE conversion_value > 500;
SELECT campaign_id, revenue, cost, revenue - cost AS profit FROM roi;
SELECT campaign_id, MAX(revenue) AS max_revenue FROM roi GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(budget) AS avg_budget FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date,...
SELECT * FROM Clicks
SELECT click_id, click_time FROM Clicks
SELECT user_id, click_location FROM Clicks
SELECT * FROM Conversions
SELECT conversion_id, conversion_time FROM Conversions
SELECT user_id, conversion_value FROM Conversions
SELECT * FROM AdCampaigns
SELECT ad_id, campaign_name FROM AdCampaigns
SELECT campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date, campaign_budget FROM AdCampaigns
SELECT * FROM ROI
SELECT ad_id, user_id, roi_value FROM ROI
SELECT ad_id, roi_date FROM ROI
SELECT * FROM Users
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM Users
SELECT user_country, user_age FROM Users
SELECT * FROM Clicks WHERE click_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Conversions WHERE conversion_id = 1
SELECT * FROM AdCampaigns WHERE ad_id = 1
SELECT * FROM ROI WHERE ad_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Clicks WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT c.click_id, c.ad_id, u.user_name FROM Clicks c JOIN Users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT AVG(roi_value) AS avg_roi FROM ROI WHERE ad_id = 456 GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_name, user_country, AVG(roi_value) AS avg_roi FROM Users u JOIN ROI r ON u.user_id = r.user_id GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM Clicks GROUP BY ad_id ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(conversion_value) AS total_conversion_value FROM AdCampaigns ac JOIN Conversions cv ON ac.ad_id = cv.ad_id GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT u.user_name, COUNT(*) AS total_conversions FROM Users u JOIN Conversions c ON u.user_id = c.user_id GROUP BY u.user_name;
SELECT ad_id, AVG(conversion_value) AS avg_conversion_value FROM Conversions GROUP BY ad_id HAVING AVG(conversion_value) > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(roi_value) AS total_roi FROM AdCampaigns ac JOIN ROI r ON ac.ad_id = r.ad_id WHERE r.roi_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM AdCampaigns ac JOIN Conversions c ON ac.ad_id = c.ad_id JOIN Users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_users > 100;
SELECT user_name, campaign_name, conversion_time FROM Users u JOIN Conversions c ON u.user_id = c.user_id JOIN AdCampaigns ac ON c.ad_id = ac.ad_id;

SELECT u.user_name, ac.campaign_name, c.conversion_time FROM Users u JOIN Conversions c ON u.user_id = c.user_id JOIN AdCampaigns ac ON c.ad_id = ac.ad_id WHERE c.conversion_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users FROM Clicks GROUP BY ad_id;
SELECT u.user_name, AVG(c.click_id) AS avg_click_id FROM Users u JOIN Clicks c ON u.user_id = c.user_id GROUP BY u.user_name;
SELECT user_name, SUM(c.click_id) AS total_click_id FROM Users u JOIN Clicks c ON u.user_id = c.user_id GROUP BY user_name HAVING total_click_id > 500;
SELECT ad_id, MIN(click_time) AS first_click_time, MAX(click_time) AS last_click_time FROM Clicks GROUP BY ad_id;
SELECT c.click_id, c.ad_id, ac.campaign_name, r.roi_value FROM Clicks c JOIN AdCampaigns ac ON c.ad_id = ac.ad_id JOIN ROI r ON c.ad_id = r.ad_id;
SELECT user_name, AVG(user_age) AS avg_user_age FROM Users GROUP BY user_name HAVING avg_user_age > 30;
SELECT ad_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM AdCampaigns WHERE campaign_end_date >= '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_name, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM Users u JOIN Clicks c ON u.user_id = c.user_id GROUP BY user_name HAVING total_clicks < 10;
